exemptionreason.description: exemptionreason is required if taxoption is Exemption Reason provided .

firstname.description: firstname is required for individual and corporate trust with family trust type  and settler of trust is individual

lastname.description: lastname is required for individual and corporate trust with family trust type  and settler of trust is individual

middlename.description: middlename is optional for individual and corporate trust with family trust type  and settler of trust is individual

regdate.description: regdate is required for indi and corp tust

registrationstate.description: registrationstate is required for indi and corp tust

registeredforgst.description: registeredforgst is required for indi and corp tust

tfn.description: tfn is required if taxoption is Tax File Number provided .

settloroftrust.description: settloroftrust is required for individual and corporate trust with trustType equal to family type.

taxoption.description: taxoption is required for individual and corporate trust.

title.description: title is required for individual and corporate trust with family trustType  and settler of trust is individual

wealthsource.description: wealthsource is required for individual and corporate trust

nameoflegislation.description: nameoflegislation is required for GOVSUPER  trustType

nameofwebsite.description: nameoflegislation is for trust verification  for GOVSUPER  trustType

arsn.description: arsn is required for indi and corp tust with INVSCHEME trustType

trustconfirmed.description: trustconfirmed is field for trust varification if trustType is INVSCHEME

trustconfirmedregulated.description: trustconfirmedregulated is field for trust varification if trustType is REGULATED

licensingnumber.description: licensingnumber is required for individual and corporate trust with REGULATED trustType

organisationName.description: organisationName is required for individual and corporate trust with FAMILY trustType  and settlerOfTrust is organisation

trustdescriptionother.description: trustdescriptionother is required for individual and corporate trust with OTHER trustType and trustdescription enum value is OTHER

additionalsourceofwealth.description: additionalsourceofwealth is required when wealthsource is Additional Sources

taxdetails.description: Taxdetails and overseas tax details for CRS

personalinvestmententity.description: This field is used in the Onboarding CMA at the account level for capturing Personal Investment Entity
